subject: Theater
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Reduced Shakespeare Company is performing its “Complete World of Sports (Abridged)" at the New Victory Theater. Lorne Manly sat down with the cast for an even more abridged chat on sports.
snippet: The Reduced Shakespeare Company is performing its “Complete World of Sports (Abridged)" at the New Victory Theater. Lorne Manly sat down with the cast for an even more abridged chat on sports.
